metadata.titleEn: Whole-rock geochemical dataset of the ~120-130 Ma Yarlung Zangbo ophiolitic peridotites, South Tibet
metadata.titleCn: 藏南雅鲁藏布江蛇绿岩橄榄岩全岩地球化学数据集（~120-130 Ma）
metadata.description: This dataset mainly comprises whole-rock major and trace element contents (from the Baigang ophiolite of the central YZO; Tables 1&2), platinum group element (PGE) abundances and Re-Os isotopic compositions (Table 3) of the Yarlung-Zangbo suture zone (YZO) ophiolitic peridotites in southern Tibet (China). All analyses were analyzed conducted at State Key Laboratory of Geological Processes and Mineral Resources, China University of Geosciences (Beijing). Whole-rock major element compositions were determined by an inductively coupled plasma optical emission spectrometer (ICP-OES) and the analytical precision is 1–3%; Whole-rock trace element concentrations were analyzed by a quadrupole inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (Q-ICP-MS) using external calibration and Rh as an internal standard. The analytical accuracy was generally better than 5% within the accepted values; (3) Whole-rock HSE abundance and Re-Os isotope analyses were conducted using an isotope dilution technique coupled with Carius tube aqua regia digestion. Osmium concentrations and isotopic compositions were determined by negative thermal ionization mass spectrometry (N-TIMS), all other HSE abundances were measured by high-resolution inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (HR-ICP-MS). The accuracy of PGE analysis (2SD) was better than 5%, and that of Os isotope analysis (2SD) was better than 0.5 ‰. The repeated analyzed values of the UB-N, an international reference meterial, are identical within uncertainties to the recommended values. The data have been published in Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta (Xu, Y., Liu, J.*, Xiong, Q., Su, B.-X., Scott, J. M., Xu, B.,Zhu, D.-C., Pearson, D. G. (2020). The complex life cycle of oceanic lithosphere: A study of Yarlung-Zangbo Ophiolitic Peridotites, Tibet. Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 277, 175-191). The main results are as follows: (1) Platinum group elements (Pd/Ir, Pt/Ir) are systematically decoupling from lithophile elements (e.g., Al2O3), while there is a positive correlation between Pd/Ir ratios and chalcophile elements (e.g., Cu). Combined with sulfide observation, it is confirmed that a BMS-rich melt metasomatism occurred in the YZO mantle after melt extraction. It is speculated that the metasomatic agent may be S-saturated forearc basaltic magmas, rather than S-undersaturated boninitic magmas; (2) There is no covariant relationship between Pd/Ir and 187Os/188Os, indicating that the influence of recent melt metasomatism on the Os isotopic composition of peridotite is limited. The simulation of mixing between the convective upper mantle and the oldest ophiolitic peridotite shows that the YZO mantle source region experienced a systematic melt extraction process after two end-member mixing; (3) Re-depleted Os model ages (TRD) indicates that the YZO mantle is heterogeneous at ~1000 km scale, and some old mantle domains (up to 2.2 Ga) are recycled into the Mesozoic Neo-Tethyan oceanic mantle (187Os/188Os peak: 0.126). The above data set illustrates the complex life cycle of the oceanic lithosphere and builds a relationship between plate tectonics and mantle evolution, which is of great significance for exploring the geodynamic mechanisms that control the composition and evolution of the Earth's upper mantle. In addition, this data set can provide a comparative reference for the study of whole-rock platinum group elements and Re-Os isotopes of peridotites and chromitites in the Bangong-Nujiang ophiolitic belt, which is of great scientific value for the systematic study of chromite mineralization and formation of Cr-PGE ore deposits.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集内容主要包括中国西藏南部雅鲁藏布江蛇绿岩橄榄岩全岩主、微量元素含量（主要来自中段的白岗蛇绿岩）（表1、表2）、铂族元素（PGE）丰度以及Re-Os同位素组成（来自东段的泽当、中段的白岗和西段的普兰）（Table 3）。以上所有数据分析均在中国地质大学（北京）地质过程与矿产资源国家重点实验室完成：全岩主量元素分析采用等离子体发射光谱仪（ICP-OES）测定，分析精度1-3%；全岩微量元素分析基于内外标法，利用四级杆等离子体电感耦合质谱仪（Q-ICP-MS）测定，分析精度优于5%；全岩铂族元素丰度与Re-Os同位素组成的分析采用同位素稀释法，测试分别在负热电离质谱仪（N-TIMS）与高分辨率电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（HR-ICP-MS）完成，PGE分析精度（2SD）优于5%，Os同位素分析精度（2SD）优于0.5 ‰，并且国际标准物质UB-N的测试值与推荐值一致。该套数据已经发表在地球化学国际权威期刊《Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta》上（Xu, Y., Liu, J.*, Xiong, Q., Su, B.-X., Scott, J. M., Xu, B., Zhu, D.-C., Pearson, D. G. (2020). The complex life cycle of oceanic lithosphere: A study of Yarlung-Zangbo ophiolitic peridotites, Tibet. Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 277, 175-191），主要成果如下：（1）铂族元素体系（Pd/Ir、Pt/Ir）与亲石元素（Al2O3）体系系统性解耦，而与亲铜元素（Cu）体系之间存在正相关性，结合镜下硫化物观察，证实雅江蛇绿岩地幔在熔体抽取后发生富贱金属硫化物的（BMS-rich）熔体交代事件，并且推测交代熔体可能为硫饱和的弧前玄武质岩浆，而非硫亏损的“玻安质”岩浆;（2）硫饱和熔体的交代指标Pd/Ir与187Os/188Os之间没有协变关系，表明近期熔体交代对橄榄岩的Os同位素组成影响有限。通过对流上地幔与最古老的蛇绿岩橄榄岩样品之间的混合模拟，揭示雅江蛇绿岩地幔源区在经历了端元混合以后还发生了系统的熔体抽取过程；（3）Re亏损Os同位素模式年龄（TRD）表明，雅江蛇绿岩地幔存在数千公里级别的不均一性，古老地幔块体（最老可达2.2 Ga）经再循环混入中生代大洋岩石圈地幔（187Os/188Os峰值：0.126）之中。以上数据系统阐释了大洋岩石圈复杂生命周期，构建了板块构造与地幔演化之间的关联，对于探索控制地球上地幔组成与演化的地球动力学机制具有重要意义。此外，该套数据可为班怒带蛇绿岩橄榄岩、铬铁矿的全岩强亲铁元素与Re-Os同位素研究提供对比参考，对于系统探究蛇绿岩铬铁矿成矿与铂族元素矿床的形成具有重大科学价值。
metadata.instructions:
File naming: data sets are stored in tabular format, and the name of the file is "2020" Geochemicaldata.xlsx ”And 2020 represents the year.
Data reading mode: Microsoft Excel
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：数据集以表格格式存储，文件的名称为“2020Geochemicaldata.xlsx”，其中2020代表年份。
数据读取方式：Microsoft Excel

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collection methods used for geochemical analysis of ophiolitic peridotites?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于蛇纹岩辉石岩地球化学分析的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 1-3% precision for whole-rock major element analysis, better than 5% precision for trace elements, better than 5% precision for platinum group elements, better than 0.5‰ precision for Os isotope analysis
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩主要元素分析的精度为1-3%，微量元素的精度优于5%，铂族元素的精度优于5%，锇同位素分析的精度优于0.5‰。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the precision of the major element analysis in a geochemical dataset related to ophiolitic peridotites?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 与蛇绿岩橄榄岩相关的地球化学数据集中，主要元素分析的精度是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'Re-Os isotopic composition' mean in the context of geochemical datasets and studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地球化学数据集和研究的背景下，“Re-Os同位素组成”指的是铼（Re）和锇（Os）的同位素比率和分布特征。这种同位素组成可以用于研究地球的地质过程、矿物形成以及地球内部的演化等。
Definition.AnswerEn: Re-Os isotopic composition refers to the measurement and analysis of rhenium (Re) and osmium (Os) isotopes in geological samples. This isotopic data is used to understand mantle processes and the geochemical evolution of the Earth's lithosphere, as it provides information about the age and source characteristics of mantle-derived rocks.
Definition.AnswerCn: Re-Os同位素组成是指对地质样品中铼（Re）和锇（Os）同位素的测量和分析。这些同位素数据用于理解地幔过程和地球岩石圈的地球化学演化，因为它提供了关于地幔源岩石的年龄和源特征的信息。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the decoupling of platinum group elements (Pd/Ir, Pt/Ir) from lithophile elements (Al2O3) tell us about the processes affecting the mantle peridotites in ophiolite complexes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 铂族元素（Pd/Ir，Pt/Ir）与亲石元素（Al2O3）的解耦可以告诉我们关于影响蛇纹岩复合体中地幔橄榄岩的过程。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The decoupling of platinum group elements from lithophile elements suggests that after the extraction of melt, the mantle peridotites underwent a metasomatic event involving base metal sulfides (BMS-rich) that were influenced by a sulfur-saturated arc-related basaltic magma rather than sulfur-poor boninitic magma. This indicates complex interactions and processes in the mantle that are not directly correlated with traditional lithophile behavior.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 铂族元素与亲石元素的解耦表明，在熔体提取后，地幔橄榄岩经历了一次与富含基性金属硫化物（BMS-rich）相关的变质事件，该事件受到硫饱和的弧相关玄武岩熔浆的影响，而不是硫贫的博尼特熔浆。这表明地幔中存在复杂的相互作用和过程，这些过程与传统的亲石行为并不直接相关。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary reasons for using specific analytical techniques such as ICP-OES, Q-ICP-MS, and HR-ICP-MS in the collection of geochemical data from ophiolitic peridotites?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用特定分析技术如ICP-OES、Q-ICP-MS和HR-ICP-MS收集来自蛇纹岩的地球化学数据的主要原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The use of techniques like ICP-OES, Q-ICP-MS, and HR-ICP-MS in geochemical data collection is primarily due to their ability to provide precise and accurate measurements of major and trace elements, as well as isotopic compositions. ICP-OES is used for main element analysis with a precision of 1-3%, suitable for obtaining comprehensive geochemical profiles. Q-ICP-MS offers superior precision (better than 5%) for trace elements based on internal and external standards, which is crucial for detailed geochemical characterization. HR-ICP-MS and N-TIMS are employed for platinum group elements and Re-Os isotopic compositions due to their high resolution and precision, essential for understanding complex processes such as melt extraction and metasomatism in mantle peridotites.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用ICP-OES、Q-ICP-MS和HR-ICP-MS等技术进行地球化学数据收集，主要是因为它们能够提供主要和微量元素以及同位素组成的精确和准确的测量。ICP-OES用于主要元素分析，精度为1-3%，适合获取全面的地球化学剖面。Q-ICP-MS基于内外标准提供优越的精度（优于5%），适用于微量元素的详细地球化学表征。HR-ICP-MS和N-TIMS则用于铂族元素和Re-Os同位素组成的分析，因其高分辨率和高精度，对于理解如熔体提取和地幔橄榄岩中的交代作用等复杂过程至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications on the understanding of mantle composition and evolution when employing isotope dilution methods for analyzing platinum group elements and Re-Os isotopes in ophiolitic peridotites?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在分析蛇绿岩橄榄岩中的铂族元素和Re-Os同位素时，采用同位素稀释方法对地幔成分和演化的理解有何影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of isotope dilution methods for analyzing platinum group elements and Re-Os isotopes in ophiolitic peridotites provides detailed insights into the complex life cycle of oceanic lithosphere. These methods reveal systematic decoupling between PGE systems (Pd/Ir, Pt/Ir) and lithophile elements (Al2O3), and a positive correlation with chalcophile elements (Cu), indicating that after melt extraction, the mantle underwent melt metasomatism by BMS-rich melts. This understanding aids in constructing the relationship between plate tectonics and mantle evolution, showing how ancient mantle domains (up to 2.2 Ga) were recycled into Mesozoic oceanic lithospheric mantle, thereby elucidating the heterogeneity and dynamics of mantle composition over geological timescales.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用同位素稀释方法分析蛇绿岩橄榄岩中的铂族元素和Re-Os同位素为海洋岩石圈的复杂生命周期提供了详细的见解。这些方法揭示了PGE系统（Pd/Ir，Pt/Ir）与岩石亲元素（Al2O3）之间的系统性解耦，以及与亲硫元素（Cu）之间的正相关，表明在熔融提取后，地幔经历了富含BMS的熔体的熔融变质作用。这一理解有助于构建板块构造与地幔演化之间的关系，显示出古老的地幔域（可追溯至22亿年前）如何被回收进中生代海洋岩石圈地幔，从而阐明了地幔成分在地质时间尺度上的异质性和动态性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the underlying objectives of collecting and analyzing geochemical data of ophiolitic peridotites from the Yarlung-Zangbo region?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集和分析雅鲁藏布地区的蛇绿岩橄榄岩的地球化学数据的基本目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives of collecting and analyzing geochemical data of ophiolitic peridotites from the Yarlung-Zangbo region include understanding the complex life cycle of oceanic lithosphere, investigating the decoupling of platinum group element systems with lithophile element systems, and exploring the interactions between melt and mantle peridotites. The analysis aims to establish the relationship between plate tectonics and mantle evolution, as well as to provide insights into the geodynamic mechanisms that control the composition and evolution of the Earth's mantle. Additionally, the dataset serves as a comparative reference for studying ophiolitic peridotites and chromitites, contributing to understanding the formation of chromite and platinum group element deposits.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集和分析雅鲁藏布地区的蛇绿岩橄榄岩的地球化学数据的目标包括理解海洋岩石圈的复杂生命周期，研究铂族元素系统与岩石元素系统的解耦，以及探索熔体与地幔橄榄岩之间的相互作用。分析旨在建立板块构造与地幔演化之间的关系，并提供对控制地球地幔成分和演化的地球动力机制的见解。此外，该数据集作为研究蛇绿岩橄榄岩和铬铁矿的比较参考，有助于理解铬铁矿和铂族元素矿床的形成。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental techniques and procedural steps are involved in analyzing the whole-rock major and trace element content in ophiolitic peridotites?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 分析蛇纹岩辉长岩的全岩主要和微量元素含量涉及哪些仪器技术和程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The analysis of whole-rock major element content is conducted using an Inductively Coupled Plasma Optical Emission Spectrometer (ICP-OES) with an analytical precision of 1-3%. For trace element analysis, a quadrupole Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (Q-ICP-MS) is used, employing an internal and external standard method, achieving an analytical precision better than 5%.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 全岩主要元素含量的分析使用电感耦合等离子体光谱仪（ICP-OES），其分析精度为1-3%。对于微量元素分析，使用四极杆电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（Q-ICP-MS），采用内标和外标方法，达到优于5%的分析精度。
